name: AbcdHcpPipeline
description: The Developmental Cognition and Neuroimaging (DCAN) Labs fMRI Pipeline. This BIDS application initiates a functional MRI processing pipeline built upon the Human Connectome Project's minimal processing pipelines. The application requires only a dataset conformed to the BIDS specification, and little-to-no additional configuration on the part of the user. BIDS format and applications are explained in detail at http://bids.neuroimaging.io/
author: DCAN-Labs (https://github.com/DCAN-Labs)
command-line: mkdir -p opt_freesurfer || exit 2; ln -f -s /opt/freesurfer/* opt_freesurfer/ || exit 2; cp -rL [FREESURFER_LICENSE] opt_freesurfer/license.txt || exit 2; export FREESURFER_HOME=$PWD/opt_freesurfer; source ${FREESURFER_HOME}/SetUpFreeSurfer.sh || exit 2; source /app/SetupEnv.sh || exit 2; bash mk_fake_bids [SUBJECT_DIR] FakeBids && python3 /app/run.py FakeBids $PWD/abcd-results-[SUBJECT_DIR] --freesurfer-license=$PWD/opt_freesurfer/license.txt [ALL_SESSIONS] --ncpus 1 [STAGE] [BANDSTOP] [CUSTOM_CLEAN] [ABCD_TASK] [STUDY_TEMPLATE_HEAD] [STUDY_TEMPLATE_BRAIN] [IGNORE] [CHECK_OUTPUTS_ONLY] [IGNORE_EXPECTED_OUTPUTS]

groups.description: Optional arguments to run abcd-hcp-pipeline. Some may actually be required where as other change default functionality.
groups.name: Optional Arguments

groups.description: Special pipeline options which pertain to an alternative pipeline or an extra stage which is not inferred from the inputted BIDS data.
groups.name: Special Pipeline Options

groups.description: Runtime options which change runtime behaviors. Debugging features.
groups.name: Runtime Options

inputs.description: To run FreeSurfer a license file must exist and be pointed to. The license can be acquired by filling out this form: https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/registration.html.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline freesurfer license

inputs.description: Collapses all sessions into one when running a subject, essentially treating data as if it were collected during a single session (per subject).
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline all sessions

inputs.description: Specify a subset of stages to run. If a single stage name is given, the pipeline with be started at that stage. If a string with a ':' is given, a stage name before the ':' will tell run.py where to start and a stage name after the ':' will tell it where to stop. If no ':' is found, the pipeline will start with the stage specified and run to the end.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline stage

inputs.description: Parameters for motion regressor band-stop filter. It is recommended for the boundaries to match the inter-quartile range for participant group respiratory rate (breaths per minute), or to match bids physio data directly. These parameters are highly recommended for data acquired with a frequency of approx. 1 Hz or more (TR<=1.0). Default is no filter.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline bandstop filter

inputs.description: Runs DCAN cleaning script after the pipeline completes successfully to delete pipeline outputs based on the file structure specified in the custom-clean JSON. Required for the custom clean stage.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline custom clean

inputs.description: Runs ABCD task data through task fMRI analysis, adding this stage to the end. Warning: Not written for general use: a general task analysis module will be included in a future release.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline abcd task

inputs.description: Template head image for intermediate nonlinear registration and masking, effective where population differs greatly from average adult, e.g. in elderly populations with large ventricles.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline study head template

inputs.description: Template brain image for intermediate nonlinear registration and masking, effective where population differs greatly from average adult, e.g. in elderly populations with large ventricles.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline study brain template

inputs.description: Ignore a modality in processing. Option can be repeated.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline ignore

inputs.description: Checks for the existence of outputs for each stage then exit. Useful for debugging.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline check outputs only

inputs.description: Continues pipeline even if some expected outputs are missing.
inputs.name: abcd-hcp-pipeline ignore expected outputs
